    • Constructor Detail

      • BTreeIndex

        public BTreeIndex(IndexInfo ii,
                  SearchKeyType keyType,
                  Transaction tx)
        Opens a B-tree index for the specified index. The method determines the appropriate files for the leaf and directory records, creating them if they did not exist.
        Parameters:
        ii - the information of this index
        keyType - the type of the indexed field
        tx - the calling transaction

        Description copied from class: Index
        Preload the index blocks to memory.
        Specified by:
        preLoadToMemory in class Index

      • beforeFirst

        public void beforeFirst(SearchRange searchRange)
        Traverses the directory to find the leaf page corresponding to the lower bound of the specified key range. The method then position the page before the first record (if any) matching the that lower bound. The leaf page is kept open, for use by the methods next() and getDataRecordId().
        Specified by:
        beforeFirst in class Index
        Parameters:
        searchRange - the range of search keys
        See Also:
        Index.beforeFirst(org.vanilladb.core.storage.index.SearchRange)

      • next

        public boolean next()
        Moves to the next index record in B-tree leaves matching the previously-specified search key. Returns false if there are no more such records.
        Specified by:
        next in class Index
        Returns:
        false if no other index records for the search range.
        See Also:
        Index.next()

      • getDataRecordId

        public RecordId getDataRecordId()
        Returns the data record ID from the current index record in B-tree leaves.
        Specified by:
        getDataRecordId in class Index
        Returns:
        the data record ID stored in the current index record.
        See Also:
        Index.getDataRecordId()

      • insert

        public void insert(SearchKey key,
                   RecordId dataRecordId,
                   boolean doLogicalLogging)
        Inserts the specified record into the index. The method first traverses the directory to find the appropriate leaf page; then it inserts the record into the leaf. If the insertion causes the leaf to split, then the method calls insert on the root, passing it the directory entry of the new leaf page. If the root node splits, then BTreeDir.makeNewRoot(org.vanilladb.core.storage.index.btree.DirEntry) is called.
        Specified by:
        insert in class Index
        Parameters:
        key - the key in the new index record.
        dataRecordId - the data record ID in the new index record.
        doLogicalLogging - is logical logging enabled
        See Also:
        Index.insert(SearchKey, RecordId, boolean)

      • delete

        public void delete(SearchKey key,
                   RecordId dataRecordId,
                   boolean doLogicalLogging)
        Deletes the specified index record. The method first traverses the directory to find the leaf page containing that record; then it deletes the record from the page.
        Specified by:
        delete in class Index
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the deleted index record
        dataRecordId - the data record ID of the deleted index record
        doLogicalLogging - is logical logging enabled
        See Also:
        Index.delete(SearchKey, RecordId, boolean)

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the index by closing its open leaf page, if necessary.
        Specified by:
        close in class Index
        See Also:
        Index.close()
